```{r setup}
devtools::load_all(".")
  # library(moranajp)
library(tidyverse)
library(grid)



cols <- c("\\u8868\\u5c64\\u5f62", "\\u54c1\\u8a5e", 
          "\\u54c1\\u8a5e\\u7d30\\u5206\\u985e1", "\\u539f\\u5f62",
          "text_id", "chap", "sect", "para") %>%
          stringi::stri_unescape_unicode()
surface_form  <- stringi::stri_unescape_unicode("\u8868\u5c64\u5f62")
original_form <- stringi::stri_unescape_unicode("\u539f\u5f62")
s_id <- "text_id"

data(review_sudachi_c)
review_sudachi_c <- 
  review_sudachi_c %>%
  unescape_utf() %>%
  dplyr::select(dplyr::all_of(cols)) %>%
  clean_sudachi_local() %>%
  delete_parenthesis()

review <- 
  review_sudachi_c %>%
  dplyr::filter(.data[[s_id]] < 20) %>%
  dplyr::filter(pos_1 != stringi::stri_unescape_unicode("\u52d5\u8a5e")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(pos_2 != stringi::stri_unescape_unicode("\u6570\u8a5e")) %>%
  dplyr::filter( !stringr::str_detect(term, "[A-z]+") ) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(`:=`(w, 
    stringi::stri_width( .data[[surface_form]]) )) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(`:=`(x, 
    purrr::accumulate(w, `+`) 
    )) %>%
  align_sentence(s_id = "text_id")

review %>%
  ggplot(aes(x, .data[[s_id]], label = term)) + 
  geom_text() + 
  theme_bw()
```

```{r, eval = FALSE}
width <- function(x, unit = "mm"){
  grid::stringWidth(x) %>%
  grid::convertWidth(unit = unit)
}
one_jp_width <- function(unit = "mm"){
  space <- stringi::stri_unescape_unicode("\u3000") 
  grid::stringWidth(space) %>%
  grid::convertWidth(unit = unit)
}
```
